subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Fred Perry of England won Wimbledon in 1934, 1935 and 1936. His countrymen’s wait for the next homegrown men’s champion will last at least one more year.
snippet: Fred Perry of England won Wimbledon in 1934, 1935 and 1936. His countrymen’s wait for the next homegrown men’s champion will last at least one more year.
